#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
ll a[100005],res[100005];

int main()
{
ll t,n,i,j,k;
cin>>t;

while(t--)
{
    cin>>n;
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cin>>a[i];
    sort(a,a+n);
    i=0;
    j=n-1;
    for(k=0;k<n;k++)
    {
        res[k]=a[i];
        k++;
        res[k]=a[j];
        i++;
        j--;
    }
    for(i=0;i<n;i++)
        cout<<res[i]<<" ";
    cout<<"\n";
}
return 0;
}
